judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed. Costs on appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: David S. Malis, with him Morton Within, for appellant.
Eugene F. Brazil, with him Michael H. Egnal, and Egnal & Simons, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Shapiro, Appellant, v. Shapiro.
Argued November 16, 1964.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused November 1, 1965.
David S. Malis, with him Morton Within, for appellant.
Eugene F. Brazil, with him Michael H. Egnal, and Egnal & Simons, for appellee.
September 29, 1965:
